languages.text: "Род Версериан распорядился о перевозе нескольких тонн припасов для ваших будущих путешествий, а также передает в ваше личное управление полк, прошедший подготовку для пустотных полетов. Каждый из этих храбрецов будет счастлив отдать жизнь за вас, Лорд-капитан". {n}Клеменциа старается сохранять бесстрастный вид, однако вы замечаете, как ее лицо светлеет от гордости.{/n} "Распоряжайтесь ими как сочтете нужным".

traits.locale_text: "Род Версериан распорядился о перевозе нескольких тонн припасов для ваших будущих путешествий, а также передает в ваше личное управление полк, прошедший подготовку для пустотных полетов. Каждый из этих храбрецов будет счастлив отдать жизнь за вас, Лорд-капитан". {n}Клеменциа старается сохранять бесстрастный вид, однако вы замечаете, как ее лицо светлеет от гордости.{/n} "Распоряжайтесь ими как сочтете нужным".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "House Werserian made arrangements for the delivery of several tonnes of supplies for your future journeys. The house is also transferring a regiment of its finest into your personal charge. Each of these brave troopers has undergone rigorous voidfarer training and will be humbled to lay down their life for you, Lord Captain." {n}Clementia is trying to maintain a neutral expression but you can see her face is beaming with pride.{/n} "Please command them as you see fit."
languages.original_text: "Род Версериан распорядился о перевозе нескольких тонн припасов для ваших будущих путешествий, а также передает в ваше личное управление полк, прошедший подготовку для пустотных полетов. Каждый из этих храбрецов будет счастлив отдать жизнь за вас, Лорд-капитан". {n}Клеменциа старается сохранять бесстрастный вид, однако вы замечаете, как ее лицо светлеет от гордости.{/n} "Распоряжайтесь ими как сочтете нужным".

traits.locale_text: "House Werserian made arrangements for the delivery of several tons of supplies for your future journeys. The house is also giving a regiment of its finest into your personal charge. Each of these brave troopers has undergone rigorous voidfarer's training and will consider it an honour to give their life for you, Lord Captain." {n}Clementia is trying to maintain a neutral expression, but you can see her face is beaming with pride.{/n} "Please command them as you see fit."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "House Werserian made arrangements for the delivery of several tonnes of supplies for your future journeys. The house is also transferring a regiment of its finest into your personal charge. Each of these brave troopers has undergone rigorous voidfarer training and will be humbled to lay down their life for you, Lord Captain." {n}Clementia is trying to maintain a neutral expression but you can see her face is beaming with pride.{/n} "Please command them as you see fit."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « La maison Werserian a pris des dispositions pour que plusieurs tonnes de fournitures vous soient livrées pour vos futurs déplacements. La maison transfère également un régiment de ses meilleurs éléments sous votre commandement. Chacun de ces courageux soldats a suivi un entraînement rigoureux sur les dangers du Warp et est prêt à se sacrifier pour vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Clémentia s'efforce de rester neutre, mais la fierté rayonne sur son visage.{/n} « Dirigez-les comme bon vous semble. »
languages.original_text: "House Werserian made arrangements for the delivery of several tonnes of supplies for your future journeys. The house is also transferring a regiment of its finest into your personal charge. Each of these brave troopers has undergone rigorous voidfarer training and will be humbled to lay down their life for you, Lord Captain." {n}Clementia is trying to maintain a neutral expression but you can see her face is beaming with pride.{/n} "Please command them as you see fit."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Werserian a pris des dispositions pour que plusieurs tonnes de fournitures vous soient livrées pour vos futurs déplacements. La maison transfère également un régiment de ses meilleurs éléments sous votre commandement. Chacun de ces courageux soldats a suivi un entraînement rigoureux sur les dangers du Warp et est prêt à se sacrifier pour vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Clémentia s'efforce de rester neutre, mais la fierté rayonne sur son visage.{/n} « Dirigez-les comme bon vous semble. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “韦尔森家族已经做好了准备，为您接下来的旅途准备了无数物资。此外，家族还将一群最出色的人员调到了您的船上。这些勇敢的士兵经过了严格的太空训练，时刻愿意为您献身，舰长大人。”{n}克莱门缇雅试图保持着不偏不倚的表情，但你看得出来，她的脸上洋溢着自豪的神色。{/n}“这些士兵全权供您差遣。”
languages.original_text: "House Werserian made arrangements for the delivery of several tonnes of supplies for your future journeys. The house is also transferring a regiment of its finest into your personal charge. Each of these brave troopers has undergone rigorous voidfarer training and will be humbled to lay down their life for you, Lord Captain." {n}Clementia is trying to maintain a neutral expression but you can see her face is beaming with pride.{/n} "Please command them as you see fit."

traits.locale_text: “韦尔森家族已经做好了准备，为您接下来的旅途准备了无数物资。此外，家族还将一群最出色的人员调到了您的船上。这些勇敢的士兵经过了严格的太空训练，时刻愿意为您献身，舰长大人。”{n}克莱门缇雅试图保持着不偏不倚的表情，但你看得出来，她的脸上洋溢着自豪的神色。{/n}“这些士兵全权供您差遣。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「ウェルザリアン家の方で、今後の陛下の旅に必要な数トンの物資を手配いたしました。また、当家の連隊の中でも精鋭を陛下の管理下に移譲する所存です。勇敢な隊員たちは皆、虚空渡りとしての厳しい訓練を受けており、ロード・キャプテンのために命を捧げることも厭わないでしょう」{n}クレメンティアは無表情を装っているが、その顔が誇らしげに輝いているのがわかる。{/n}「お好きなように指揮してやってください」
languages.original_text: "House Werserian made arrangements for the delivery of several tonnes of supplies for your future journeys. The house is also transferring a regiment of its finest into your personal charge. Each of these brave troopers has undergone rigorous voidfarer training and will be humbled to lay down their life for you, Lord Captain." {n}Clementia is trying to maintain a neutral expression but you can see her face is beaming with pride.{/n} "Please command them as you see fit."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェルザリアン家の方で、今後の陛下の旅に必要な数トンの物資を手配いたしました。また、当家の連隊の中でも精鋭を陛下の管理下に移譲する所存です。勇敢な隊員たちは皆、虚空渡りとしての厳しい訓練を受けており、ロード・キャプテンのために命を捧げることも厭わないでしょう」{n}クレメンティアは無表情を装っているが、その顔が誇らしげに輝いているのがわかる。{/n}「お好きなように指揮してやってください」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Haus Werserian hat Vorbereitungen für die Lieferung mehrerer Tonnen an Vorräten für Eure zukünftigen Reisen eingeleitet. Ebenso übergibt das Haus ein Regiment seiner besten Soldaten in Eure persönliche Obhut. Jeder dieser tapferen Soldaten durchlief die strenge Ausbildung als Raumfahrer und steht bereit, sein Leben für Euch zu geben, Lord Captain." {n}Clementia versucht einen neutralen Gesichtsausdruck zu wahren, aber du erkennst, wie sie vor Stolz strahlt.{/n} "Bitte befehligt sie, so wie Ihr es für richtig haltet!"
languages.original_text: "House Werserian made arrangements for the delivery of several tonnes of supplies for your future journeys. The house is also transferring a regiment of its finest into your personal charge. Each of these brave troopers has undergone rigorous voidfarer training and will be humbled to lay down their life for you, Lord Captain." {n}Clementia is trying to maintain a neutral expression but you can see her face is beaming with pride.{/n} "Please command them as you see fit."

traits.locale_text: "Haus Werserian hat Vorbereitungen für die Lieferung mehrerer Tonnen an Vorräten für Eure zukünftigen Reisen eingeleitet. Ebenso übergibt das Haus ein Regiment seiner besten Soldaten in Eure persönliche Obhut. Jeder dieser tapferen Soldaten durchlief die strenge Ausbildung als Raumfahrer und steht bereit, sein Leben für Euch zu geben, Lord Captain." {n}Clementia versucht einen neutralen Gesichtsausdruck zu wahren, aber du erkennst, wie sie vor Stolz strahlt.{/n} "Bitte befehligt sie, so wie Ihr es für richtig haltet!"
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «La casa Werserian ha dispuesto la entrega de varias toneladas de suministros para sus futuras travesías. También desea transferirle un regimiento de sus mejores tropas para su contingente personal. Cada uno de estos valerosos soldados se ha sometido a un riguroso adiestramiento como viajero del vacío y daría la vida gustoso por usted, Lord Capitán». {n}Clementia se esfuerza por mantener una expresión neutral, pero puedes ver que su rostro está encendido por el orgullo.{/n} «Por favor, disponga de ellos como estime apropiado».
languages.original_text: "House Werserian made arrangements for the delivery of several tonnes of supplies for your future journeys. The house is also transferring a regiment of its finest into your personal charge. Each of these brave troopers has undergone rigorous voidfarer training and will be humbled to lay down their life for you, Lord Captain." {n}Clementia is trying to maintain a neutral expression but you can see her face is beaming with pride.{/n} "Please command them as you see fit."

traits.locale_text: «La casa Werserian ha dispuesto la entrega de varias toneladas de suministros para sus futuras travesías. También desea transferirle un regimiento de sus mejores tropas para su contingente personal. Cada uno de estos valerosos soldados se ha sometido a un riguroso adiestramiento como viajero del vacío y daría la vida gustoso por usted, Lord Capitán». {n}Clementia se esfuerza por mantener una expresión neutral, pero puedes ver que su rostro está encendido por el orgullo.{/n} «Por favor, disponga de ellos como estime apropiado».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Werserian Hanesi, gelecekteki yolculuklarınızda kullanılmak üzere birkaç ton erzak sevkiyatı yapmak için gerekli ayarlamaları yaptı. Hane, alaylarındaki en iyi askerleri de kişisel olarak emrinize atadı. Bu cesur birliklerin her biri, sıkı bir uçsuz yolculuğu eğitiminden geçmiş ve canlarını uğrunuza feda etmekten mutlu olurlar Lord Kaptan." {n}Clementia, tarafsız bir ifade takınmaya çalışsa da yüzünün kıvançla parladığını görebiliyorsun.{/n} "Lütfen onları gönlünüzce komuta edin."
languages.original_text: "House Werserian made arrangements for the delivery of several tonnes of supplies for your future journeys. The house is also transferring a regiment of its finest into your personal charge. Each of these brave troopers has undergone rigorous voidfarer training and will be humbled to lay down their life for you, Lord Captain." {n}Clementia is trying to maintain a neutral expression but you can see her face is beaming with pride.{/n} "Please command them as you see fit."

traits.locale_text: "Werserian Hanesi, gelecekteki yolculuklarınız için birkaç ton erzak sevkiyatı yapmak için gerekli adımları attı. Hane ayrıca alaylarındaki en iyi askerleri, kişisel olarak sizin emrinize atadı. Bu cesur birliklerin her biri sıkı bir uçsuz yolcusu eğitimi almış durumdalar ve yaşamlarını sizin için feda etmekten mutlu olurlar Lord Kaptan." {n}Clementia tarafsız bir ifade takınmaya çalışıyor ancak yüzünün kıvançla parladığını görebiliyorsun.{/n} "Lütfen onları gönlünüzce komuta edin."
traits.speaker: Clemence
